short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser plug-in that wipes out the word 'cancer' from your online life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On behalf of Cancer Research UK, fund & awareness raising for their 'Women of Influence' campaign, Tomorrowww is a browser extension that allows the user to temporarily hide any instance of the word 'Cancer' from their web experience. 

If supported via sponsorship, Women of Influence are striving to make a world free from Cancer a reality, offline. Tomorrowww helps us imagine this future, online.
